channel.title: Soham Bonnerjee on StatWizard
channel.description: Recent content in Soham Bonnerjee on StatWizard

item.title: Analysis of basic Epidemiological models
item.description: This project was to familiarize ourselves with a basic understanding of statistical modelling of epidemiology, learn about SIR and eSIR model, their estimation procedures both under frequentist and Baysian perspectives, as well as make projections of the covid cases over next several days.
